testimonials.text: This is phenomenal. It will save our small firm thousands of dollars in non-billable time per month.
testimonials.author: Janine S.

testimonials.text: Engage is what AI should be for lawyers. It's easy to use for me and my team.
testimonials.author: Bart H.

testimonials.text: I love that you can customize the questions you want to ask in order to screen potential clients.
testimonials.author: Lisa B.
